definition: a cylindrical container that holds liquids, to put in barrels
details:
noun
- a cylindrical container that holds liquids
= synonyms: cask
- a tube through which a bullet travels when a gun is fired
= synonyms: gun barrel
- any of various units of capacity
= example: any of various units of capacity
= synonyms: bbl
- the quantity that a barrel (of any size) will hold
= synonyms: barrelful
- a bulging cylindrical shape
= synonyms: drum
verb
- to put in barrels
= example: to put in barrels
